M

main(String[]) - 类 中的静态方法BigTwoClient
Main method to start the online version of the Big Two game

main() method for starting the server.
makeConnection() - 类 中的方法BigTwoClient
 
makeConnection() - 接口 中的方法NetworkGame
Makes a network connection to the server.
makeMove(int, int[]) - 类 中的方法BigTwoClient
 
makeMove(int, int[]) - 接口 中的方法CardGame
Makes a move by the player.
MAX_CARD_IN_HAND - 类 中的静态变量BigTwoTable
the maximum number of cards held by each player
MOVE - 类 中的静态变量CardGameMessage
Sent by a client when the local player makes a move.
moveCardTo(int) - 类 中的方法AnimationPanel
Distribute the top card to the given player
MSG - 类 中的静态变量CardGameMessage
Sent by a client to the server when the local player press [ENTER] in the chat input field.
